benchmark_details.name: Graphine: A Dataset for Graph-aware Terminology Definition Generation
benchmark_details.overview: Graphine encompasses 2,010,648 terminology definition pairs organized in 227 directed acyclic graphs (DAGs), which makes it a unique resource for exploring graph-aware text generation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective is to study definition generation in the biomedical domain.

data.source: Collected from three major biomedical ontology databases: Open Biological and Biomedical Ontology Foundry (OBO), BioPortal, and EMBL-EBI Ontology Lookup Service (OLS).

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated comparing generated definitions against true definitions using n-gram overlaps.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating definitions.
methodology.validation: Validation through both automatic and human evaluations on generated definitions.
